lecture.speech: Thank you for your using MelOn! First of all, I'll teach you how to take lessons in MelOn.
Now, I'll tell you about one of the lessons in MelOn named Tracing Making Music.
What do you mean Tracing music?
You can find musical score at the end of this story. In that score, some white clear notes are prepared.
I've got it! I can click them and trace the notes to make music!
Yes, you can, great! Try to trace the clear notes!
What? There is the NEXT button below the score, but it seems not to work.
You should push the melon shaped button over the score to play the music. Then you can push the NEXT button.
Oh, after finishing playing the music, the NEXT button changes its color! Now I can go to the next.
Cool! So, let's try the Tracing Making Music!
